content.rendered: Crafted with premium velvet fabric, this sofa offers both style and comfort. The tufted detailing creates a plush seating area, perfect for lounging or entertaining guests. The Y-leg gold color legs not only ensure stability but also add a touch of glamour to the overall design, making it a stunning centerpiece for your living room.

excerpt.rendered:
Elevate your living space with the Azzurro Modern Chesterfield Sofa from Furniturezone.pk. Inspired by the tranquil hues of the Italian word for light blue, this sofa exudes elegance and charm. The scroll arm and scroll back design blend classic sophistication with modern flair, making it a versatile addition to any contemporary home.

Specifications:

  • Type: Living Room Furniture
  • Fabric: Velvet
  • Appearance: Modern Style
  • Color: Soft Baby Blue (Azzurro)
  • Dimensions: 82-86″W x 36.22″D x 31.5″H
  • Seating Capacity: 3
  • Included Components: 2 Square Accent Pillows

Transform your space with the Azzurro Modern Chesterfield Sofa and experience a harmonious blend of classic charm and contemporary style. Shop now at Furniturezone.pk and elevate your home decor today!
